product_name: SportHill Ultimate Visibility Zip Top - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: With plenty of reflectivity to enhance visibility, the women's SportHill Ultimate Visibility zip top uses wind-resistant, moisture-wicking fabric to beat the chill during cold-weather workouts. Wind-resistant, stretchy, quick-drying and moisture-wicking fabric keeps you warm and comfortable during intense activity. Deep 12 in. front zipper with internal windflap and zipper garage lets you control ventilation. Thumbholes let you secure the sleeves over hands and wrists for warmth. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Slim, athletic cut. Special buy.
short_description: With plenty of reflectivity to enhance visibility, the women's SportHill Ultimate Visibility zip top uses wind-resistant, moisture-wicking fabric to beat the chill during cold-weather workouts.
